scripts.dev:raw: bun run --filter ./apps/dashboard dev & bun run --filter api dev
scripts.build: bun run --filter ./apps/dashboard build && bun run --filter api build && bun run --filter @crm/ui build && bun run --filter @crm/types build && bun run --filter config build
scripts.test: bun run --filter ./apps/api test && bun run --filter ./apps/dashboard test
scripts.db:migrate: bun run --filter ./apps/api db:migrate && bun run --filter ./apps/dashboard db:migrate
scripts.db:seed: bun run --filter ./apps/api db:seed && bun run --filter ./apps/dashboard db:seed
